sentences.en: Do please forgive this tardy reply.
Excessive application of nitrogen fertilizers results in tardy bearing.
sentences.cn: 施用过量的氮肥结果使树延迟结果.

sentences.en: He continually bewailed his tardy journey to his mother's house.
sentences.cn: 他总不断地悲怨自己迟缓迁延,没早早地去探望他母亲.

sentences.en: He was tardy at school [ for supper ].
sentences.cn: 他上学 [ 晚餐 ] 迟到.

sentences.en: He wept for the loss of his mother and his tardy recognition of her affection.
sentences.cn: 他痛哭流涕，不仅因为失去了母亲，还因为这么晚才认识到了妈妈对他的爱。

sentences.en: He’s been tardy three times this semester.
sentences.cn: 这学期他已经迟到三次了。

sentences.en: I was as tardy as ever for the afternoon appointments.
sentences.cn: 和以往一样，下午的约见我又迟到了。

sentences.en: I've never been tardy, absent, disobedient, slothful or disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 我从未缓慢, 缺席, 不服从, 懒惰或者不敬.

sentences.en: It's impolite to make a tardy appearance.
Steven was tardy this morning and alleges that his bus was late.
sentences.cn: 史提芬今天早上迟到的说词是公车误点了.

sentences.en: The agency was heavily criticised for its tardy response to the hurricane.
sentences.cn: 该机构因对飓风反应迟缓，受到严厉批评。

sentences.en: The boss is unsatisfied with the tardy tempo.
sentences.cn: 老板不满于这种缓慢的进度.

sentences.en: The law is often tardy in reacting to changing attitudes.
sentences.cn: 法律对变化中的观念常常反应迟缓。

sentences.en: Then brusquely his tardy rage flamed up.
sentences.cn: 跟着,他那迟迟不来的怒火猛的冒起来了.

sentences.en: They were tardy in offering help.
Tom is always tardy for school.
Two of the pupiles were tardy this morning.

trans.tran_cn: 行动缓慢的， 缓缓移动的，晚的， 迟的
